about_the_game:
The last seed of a decayed forest journeys to breathe life into the stolen paradise. In FUZZ you'll fly through a land of whimsical nature and lost technology, engage in fluid aerial combat, and use the world around you to unlock new areas and conquer challenges.
* Gather the forces of nature, technology, and spirit by flying through the environment and pulling items and elements into your Gale.
* Use the Tether to tie objects together or pull things apart.
* Travel to 5 unique environments, each full of new challenges, new weapons and tools, new ecosystems, and old mysteries.
detailed_description:
The last seed of a decayed forest journeys to breathe life into the stolen paradise. In FUZZ you'll fly through a land of whimsical nature and lost technology, engage in fluid aerial combat, and use the world around you to unlock new areas and conquer challenges.
* Gather the forces of nature, technology, and spirit by flying through the environment and pulling items and elements into your Gale.
* Use the Tether to tie objects together or pull things apart.
* Travel to 5 unique environments, each full of new challenges, new weapons and tools, new ecosystems, and old mysteries.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: FUZZ

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX10
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Fly through a land of whimsical nature and lost technology, engage in fluid aerial combat, and use the world around you to unlock new areas and conquer new challenges.
